info.title: Service for namespace org.example.odata.salesservice
info.description:
This service is located at [http://localhost/Sales.svc/](http://localhost/Sales.svc/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](https://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[Currency{bg:orange}],[Customer{bg:orange}],[Customer]-*>[Sales],[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-0..1>[Category],[Product]-*>[Sales],[Sales{bg:orange}],[Sales]->[Customer],[Sales]->[Time],[Sales]->[Product],[Sales]->[SalesOrganization],[Sales]->[Currency],[SalesOrganization{bg:orange}],[SalesOrganization]-0..1>[SalesOrganization],[Time{bg:orange}])
